item.title: Deities
item.description: %% Begin Waypoint %% Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver Elemental Primordials First Born %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Dyn Ilosgi
item.description: Tells the story of the Dyn Ilosgi.

item.title: Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver
item.description: The Eidolons of the Elemensus Primeval are all that remain of the once great Titans. There presence stretches far and wide across the Cloud Sea but are particularly active on The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Elemental Primordials
item.description: Before there was man or women, beast or burden, and even before the so-called First Born, there were the Elemensus Primeval.

item.title: Eyre Chthonic
item.description: Tells the story of the Eyre Chthonic.

item.title: First Born
item.description: Fought and largely destroyed the Elemental Primordials in a great calamitous battle.

item.title: Gwneaud O Ddŵr
item.description: Tells the story of the Gwneaud O Ddŵr.

item.title: Rhedwr Gwynt
item.description: Tells the story of the Rhedwr Gwynt.
